title: Santa Barbara City Sightseeing Tour
body:
On this three-hour tour you will learn all about the history and architecture of Santa Barbara. You will visit the Old Mission, Stearns' Wharf, the Presidio and many other fabulous sites.  During the tour your guide will share information about these locations as well as stories about the city. We will also stop at the Santa Barbara Courthouse where you will be invited to climb the clock tower which offers one of Santa Barbara's most beautiful views. If you want to see all that Santa Barbara has to offer, this is the way to do it! 

Price depending on group size.
